note.p: See n. 1 to M to C. Daley, 13 September 1894.

cell.p:
Brachyloma daphnoides Bentham
Each item in this list has been ticked in pencil.

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2;

cell.p: Wants confirmation, as the flowers are not yet developed.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2; text-align: end;

margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2;

cell.p: Probably H. glabella, RBr., but leaves wanting

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2; text-align: end;

cell.p: Persoonia rigida, RBrown, a small-leaved form.

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2;

cell.p: We had this not so far N.W. before; the new locality shall be recorded under your name in my works. Kindly get more specimens of this

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

cell.p: You may perhaps be able to find the Aldrovanda vesiculosa in lagoons there entangled among other submerged or floating plants

Ferd. von Mueller.
